EsdlBundle.Definitions: <esxdl name="ThreeExample2"> <EsdlStruct name="NameInfo"> <EsdlElement default="Joe" name="First" type="string"/> <EsdlElement default="Doe" name="Last" type="string"/> <EsdlArray item_tag="Alias" name="Aliases" type="string"/> </EsdlStruct> <EsdlStruct name="AddressInfo"> <EsdlElement name="Line1" type="string"/> <EsdlElement name="Line2" type="string"/> <EsdlElement name="City" type="string"/> <EsdlElement name="State" type="string"/> <EsdlElement default="33487" name="Zip" type="int"/> <EsdlEnum default="Home" enum_type="AddressType" name="type"/> </EsdlStruct> <EsdlResponse name="TestInfoResponse"> <EsdlElement default="0" name="count" type="int"/> <EsdlElement complex_type="NameInfo" name="Name"/> <EsdlArray item_tag="Address" name="Addresses" type="AddressInfo"/> </EsdlResponse> <EsdlResponse name="OtherInfoResponse"> <EsdlElement default="0" name="count" type="int"/> <EsdlElement complex_type="NameInfo" name="Name"/> <EsdlArray item_tag="Address" name="Addresses" type="AddressInfo"/> </EsdlResponse> <EsdlResponse name="ThreeExample2PingResponse"/> <EsdlResponse name="RoxieEchoPersonInfo2Response"> <EsdlElement default="0" name="count" type="int"/> <EsdlElement complex_type="NameInfo" name="Name"/> <EsdlArray item_tag="Address" name="Addresses" type="AddressInfo"/> </EsdlResponse> <EsdlEnumType base_type="string" name="AddressType"> <EsdlEnumItem enum="Home" name="HOME"/> <EsdlEnumItem enum="Work" name="WORK"/> <EsdlEnumItem enum="Hotel" name="HOTEL"/> </EsdlEnumType> <EsdlService name="ThreeExample2" version="0.01"> <EsdlMethod name="TestInfo" request_type="TestInfoRequest" response_type="TestInfoResponse"/> <EsdlMethod name="OtherInfo" request_type="OtherInfoRequest" response_type="OtherInfoResponse"/> <EsdlMethod auth_feature="none" name="Ping" request_type="ThreeExample2PingRequest" response_type="ThreeExample2PingResponse"/> <EsdlMethod name="RoxieEchoPersonInfo2" request_type="RoxieEchoPersonInfo2Request" response_type="RoxieEchoPersonInfo2Response"/> </EsdlService> <EsdlRequest name="TestInfoRequest"> <EsdlElement complex_type="NameInfo" name="Name"/> <EsdlArray item_tag="Address" name="Addresses" type="AddressInfo"/> </EsdlRequest> <EsdlRequest name="OtherInfoRequest"> <EsdlElement complex_type="NameInfo" name="Name"/> <EsdlArray item_tag="Address" name="Addresses" type="AddressInfo"/> </EsdlRequest> <EsdlRequest name="ThreeExample2PingRequest"/> <EsdlRequest name="RoxieEchoPersonInfo2Request">
